attributes.additional_details:
I want the Government to support  innovation, Invention and Entrepreneurship  for the early stage start ups. By doing this we can grow ourselves out of the looming recession,  by creating new jobs,

How are we going to achieve  this?.

I want the government for next 5 years  to make available the £10 Billion it gets from unclaimed estates and the £1 billion it gets from criminal assets.

This money could paid as a loan/grant/or investment. By doing this the health and welling of society and the economy would improve.
